ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Return of an Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: To be honest, its quite easy (if not time consuming) to get your faction up in calibis...  I suggest making a decent pet and hanging around not too too far
ygData.messageBody:
To be honest, its quite easy (if not time consuming) to get your faction up
in calibis... I suggest making a decent pet and hanging around not too too
far away from the city entrance in the Warslik Woods, killing hundreds and
hundreds of the little goblins that frequent the area. They are extremely
plentiful, and even the whelps provide faction with both the Legion of
Calibis and Firona Vie.

If you're feeling these are too weak, you can always go to the other goblin
camps between the overthere and calibis (in Warslik woods). At one camp, a
goblin will spawn names Dragoth(?) the Destroyer, which conned yellow to a
level 32 ranger that came by after me and a friend were slaughtered by him
and were sitting around contemplating what to do about him. Let me know if
you want more particulars about this goblin... he's an easy spawn to find
and also easy to make appear after not much time... you just need to be in
the right area.

There is also some Iksar bandit camps in this zone, but you will lose
faction with another faction which I believe is the shadowknight guild in
calibis, although you still gain factions with the Legions of Calibis.

Cogg - RZ

----- Original Message -----
From: Shawn Alley <shawna@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 4:11 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Return of an Enchanter


> spittin mad:
> Illusion Iksar - The Iksar can see right through it making this spell
almost
> useless in it's current form. The only way I can see to make the spell
work
> is to raise your faction with the Iksar so they won't kill you. But if
you
> are going to go to all this work what's the point of the spell in the
first
> place.
>
> The faction for Agnostic enchanters needs to be raised so that they are at
> least dubious with this illusion. I was able to get my faction up to
> "Threateningly" by using illusion Iksar and benevolence so I know it's
> possible to raise faction above KOS, just a pain.
>
> never give up my enchanter:
> breeze, clarity line - I'm the hit of any caster party
> mez line - nothin feels better than ordering the party when to start/stop
> attacking MOBs so you can park them
>
> 8)
> - Shawn
>

these

mana
> speed up spells I'm sure one of the most bothered classes-a'la SoW-in the

>
> And Since I haven't played in about a year, I'll try to start up a debate!
> What are the best and worst changes to the Enchanters as of late? What
makes

> you spittin mad and what makes you want to never give up the class??
